juding_criteria:
Here is a bullet list of required elements:

*   A sleeping cat, curled up, on a corner of the white couch.
*   The white sectional couch (largely as depicted in the original image, now hosting the cat).
*   The marble coffee table.
*   An open book on the coffee table.
*   A driftwood sculpture on the coffee table.
*   A glass vase with green leaves on the coffee table.
*   A set of black candle holders with white candles on the coffee table.
*   Dark grey throw pillows on the couch.
*   A white and black patterned throw pillow on the couch.
*   Tall potted green plants behind the couch.
*   Large black-framed windows.
*   The view of an urban balcony and/or buildings through the windows.
*   A light grey textured rug.
*   A partially visible black leather and metal armchair.
*   A partially visible pink/copper-colored side table.
*   A partially visible light-colored fur throw draped on the couch.
